sn45.10:4.2: Atha kho nandiyo paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn45.10:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn45.10:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nandiyo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.10:4.6: “kati nu kho, bho gotama, dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nibbānaṅgamā honti nibbānaparāyanā nibbānapariyosānā”ti?
sn45.10:5.1: “Aṭṭhime kho, nandiya, dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nibbānaṅgamā honti nibbānaparāyanā nibbānapariyosānā.
sn45.10:5.6: Ime kho, nandiya, aṭṭha dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nibbānaṅgamā honti nibbānaparāyanā nibbānapariyosānā”ti.
sn45.10:5.7: Evaṃ vutte, nandiyo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.10:5.8: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
sn45.10:5.9: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
